entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
